Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: First Level of planned Flex-Office Building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Phoenix on ±51 acres with frontage on Loop 202, SKYWAY 202 is a new highly accessible business hub where today’s best workforce builds tomorrow’s success.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Skyway 202 Business Park offers seven tilt-wall construction buildings; four are Corporate Office (Buildings 2,5,6,7) and three are Flex-Office (Buildings 1,3,4). The site has Loop 202 freeway frontage, 5/1000 parking, and City of Phoenix water/sewer.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: First Level of planned Flex-Office Building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated on ±71 acres centrally located in northwest Phoenix, the Deer Valley Business Campus offers inspired flex-tech buildings that will suit your company's needs today and into the future.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Highly accessible to I-17 and Loop 101, Deer Valley Business Center plans for nine (9) 2-level flex-office buildings totaling ±822,287 SF, with abundant parking, 25' clear height, and Office and Industrial zoning.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: One- and two-level Corporate Office buildings
Two Retail PADs along W Bell Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This ±82-acre mixed-use campus will provide a modern park design with buildings surrounded by extensive mature landscaping. Close to restaurants, hotels and other retail amenities, this business center will offer numerous sought-after features.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Bell 17 Business Center offers ±1M total SF of 1- and 2-level Corporate Office, Flex-Office, and General Industrial buildings and Retail PADS along W. Bell Road. Parking at 6/1000 available.
